snippet: The boycott threat is the latest development in a conflict between the festival, the South Korean film industry and the Busan city government.
abstract: The boycott threat is the latest development in a conflict between the festival, the South Korean film industry and the Busan city government.

headline.main: Film Groups Threaten Boycott of South Korean Film Festival
headline.print_headline: Leading Asian Film Fest Is Facing a Boycott
